name: places/ChIJWQWpb0pZwokRqsZsT3k-nJ8
adrFormatAddress: 875 5th Ave # 1cde, New York, NY 10065-4952, USA

originalText.text:
I was gifted a signature facial at The Spa at Fifth Avenue Aesthetics by my sister-in-law. She recommended I see Danielle as she recently had a facial with her and loved it.  The 2 hours I was with Danielle her hands never left my face. She did extractions and used several different machines to lift, tone and exfoliate my skin.  She also did a special massage to help with puffiness under my eyes and I couldn’t believe the difference!  This girl knows her stuff.  When I left there my skin was glowing and it still is 2 weeks later.  Danielle picked out some products for me based on her analysis of my skin. The spa carries several brands all of which are very highly regarded among my skin care obsessed friends. I decided to purchase 3 of them and Ana, the product specialist at The Spa, walked me through when and how to use them. She incorporated the products I was already using and even wrote out a little cheat sheet for me to bring home. Such a lovely touch!  My entire experience at The Spa at Fifth Avenue - from calling to schedule my appointment to checking out and everything in between - was absolutely 5 star.
Highly recommend!

originalText.text: The spa was a delightful experience! I had the pleasure of seeing Danielle who was very attentive to my skin goals. She used an array of products including Biologique Recherche and made me feel relaxed the entire time. By the end, my skin was glowing and extremely clear. I am now a true believer that facials should be routine just like getting my nails or hair done is routine! I will definitely be returning.

text.text: The spa was a delightful experience! I had the pleasure of seeing Danielle who was very attentive to my skin goals. She used an array of products including Biologique Recherche and made me feel relaxed the entire time. By the end, my skin was glowing and extremely clear. I am now a true believer that facials should be routine just like getting my nails or hair done is routine! I will definitely be returning.

originalText.text: If I could give more than 5 stars, I would! Today I had a facial with Danielle, she listened to my concerns and addressed them accordingly. As someone that used to suffer bad acne growing up, I try to do my best to take care of my skin, but since the start of the pandemic, I’ve been breaking out like crazy from wearing masks all the time. Today I had the best facial of my life, I left the salon feeling happy, relaxed, and more than ecstatic about how healthy my skin looked. I can’t wait to go back!

originalText.text: I’ve never had a professional facial done. Honestly, I never thought I needed it. But my sister convinced me to try this spa in particular because they’re aestheticians are under the supervision of a board certified dermatologist. As a person in the healthcare field, this is important to me. I had a signature facial done with Danielle, and now facials are a must for me. I had no idea that a lymphatic drainage technique had anything to do with beauty, but I totally see the results. Love love love!

originalText.text: My friend referred me to Danielle after I told her about my pretty bad breakout, and I was not disappointed. I don't think my skin has ever looked so good. Danielle really worked with me and catered the treatment towards my skin needs. Definitely will be back!
